recipe.ingredients: - oats: 1/2 cup - banana: 1 medium - almond milk (unsweetened): 1 cup - Greek yogurt (non-fat): 1/2 cup - honey: 1 tablespoon - ground cinnamon: 1/4 teaspoon - ice cubes: 1/2 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Oats: Place the oats in a blender and blend until they are ground into a fine powder. 2. Blend Ingredients: In the blender with the ground oats, add banana, almond milk, Greek yogurt, honey, cinnamon, and ice cubes. 3. Puree until Smooth: Blend all the ingredients on high until smooth and creamy. 4. Serve: Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy immediately for a refreshing and healthy start to your day.
